channel.title: Cloudera Inspect Network Performance on Debuntarium
channel.description: Recent content in Cloudera Inspect Network Performance on Debuntarium

item.title: Неудачный запуск 'Inspect Network Performance': Failed running performance inspector on cluster
item.description: Проблема В результате запуска на кластере проверки “Inspect Network Performance” мы можем наблюдать картину: В логах /var/log/cloudera-scm-agent/cloudera-scm-agent.log: Thread-17 supervisor WARNING Failed while getting process info. Retrying. (<Fault 10: 'BAD_NAME: 3050-host-perf-inspector'>) В /var/run/cloudera-scm-agent/process/3050-host-perf-inspector/logs присутствует пустой файл stdout.log, а в файле stderr.log видна ошибка “SyntaxError: invalid syntax”: [21/Oct/2020 14:56:56 +0000] 105531 MainThread redactor INFO Started launcher: /opt/cloudera/cm-agent/service/perf/host_perf_diag.py input.json logs/result.json [21/Oct/2020 14:56:56 +0000] 105531 MainThread redactor ERROR Redaction rules file doesn't exist, not redacting logs.
